entities.description: A person suspected of using a substance or equipment listed in the survey.
The type of substance used by the offender, such as alcohol, computer equipment, or drug/narcotics.
A case recorded in the survey, representing the data collected on each instance.
The unweighted frequency or count of instances for each substance.

relationships.description: Indicates the type of substance suspected to be used by the offender.
Relates each survey case to the count or frequency of instances recorded.
